name: @utx/result
description: A typescript implementation of Rust's Result and Option objects.
author: Gabe M <hey@gabe.mx>

scripts.xbuild: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:copy
scripts.xbuild:ts: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.json -m esnext --outDir dist/esm/ -d false -declarationMap false
scripts.xbuild:copy: copyfiles README.md LICENSE src/package.json dist --flat && copyfiles src/rxjs-operators/package.json dist --up 1
